name: Avnet, Inc.
summary: Avnet, Inc. is a global distributor of electronic components and technology solutions, serving manufacturers, designers, and resellers worldwide. Founded in 1921 and headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Avnet provides supply chain, logistics, and design support services to accelerate and scale product development across the electronics industry. The company operates through two main segments—Electronic Components and Farnell—serving over a million customers in more than 140 countries.
